title: Millionaire YouTuber Hank Green tells Gen Z to rethink their Tesla bets—and shares the portfolio changes he’s making to avoid AI-bubble fallout
description: The S&P 500’s record concentration in AI-focused companies like Nvidia, Microsoft, and Google could bear bad news in the event of a bubble pop, says YouTuber Hank Green.

title: America, meet your alienated youth: ‘Gold standard’ Harvard survey reveals Gen Z’s anxiety and distrust, defined by economic insecurity
description: The Harvard Youth Poll pulls back the curtain to reveal a generation defined by widespread distrust in the economy.

title: Spotify Wrapped has given us all a 'listening age' — and it's making some people mad
description: Spotify Wrapped is calling out 23-year-old Gen Z'ers for having the listening habits of a boomer. What's "listening age" tell us about ourselves?

title: From college dropout to Ironman CEO in 7 years, this Gen Z founder found ‘no pain, no gain’ from a trip to China and the Shaolin monks
description: Gustas Germanavicius, one of Lithuania's top Ironmen at 27 years old, told Fortune about what he learned on his trip to China: "practice makes tired."

title: Gen Z and boomer shoppers are upping their holiday spending budgets despite a tough economy
description: A PwC survey found that shoppers are planning to spend more on holiday gifts than they were this summer -- Gen Z and Baby Boomers in particular

title: Inside Chips Ahoy's plan to win over Gen Z — with help from Netflix's 'Stranger Things'
description: Chips Ahoy's strategy to stay relevant with Gen Z includes a cross-brand collaboration with Netflix's "Stranger Things" and its first fruity flavor.

title: Inside the private clubs for the Gen Z and millennial day traders serious about making money in markets
description: Members of private day trading clubs who offered Business Insider a glimpse into their circles said social events and networking were perks of membership.

title: Gen Z isn’t lazy. They’re the most intentional job seekers yet
description: The data tells a different story about Gen Z: they're deliberate, analytical, and treat job selection as they should – a high-stakes investment.

title: Gap CEO says its viral denim campaign wasn't just a hit online — it drove double-digit growth in sales, fueled by Gen Z
description: Gap CEO Richard Dickson said its viral campaign during the summer's denim ad wars drove double-digit growth in sales, fueled by Gen Z.

title: Gen Z is making old-school finance cool again — and older investors want the 'cool new thing,' Robinhood CEO says
description: Robinhood's Vlad Tenev says Gen Z is embracing traditional finance and opening retirement accounts as older investors flock to the "cool new thing."

title: One of Gen Z's habits is an 'existential threat' to restaurants, says Michelin-starred chef David Chang
description: David Chang warns Gen Z's low alcohol consumption is causing huge problems for restaurants already dealing with major headwinds.
